column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////First night in Chicago for a couple Oakland A's baseball games so we went straight to Lou Malnati's for a deep dish pizza! Great decision! We've always gone for a thin crust pie - NY style. But
column2: I gotta say Lou Malnati's pie was just as good as any of the best NY pies we've had. Simple ingredients
